title: Should we add a "Wellcome back" re-staking function during 8 day unstaking period?
body: At this time, once we decided to unstake it's not possible to stake again that same OM if we think it twice. Adding a function to re-stake the unstaked OM would help keeping more of it inside the platform.
author: 0x4C28b1A34705E9b569112e6472C41D9A73a89550
